thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 25 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Allegiant Travel Co Reports Qtrly EPS Of $3.42

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Allegiant Travel Co Reports Qtrly EPS Of $3.42
text:
April 25 (Reuters) - Allegiant Travel Co:
* ALLEGIANT TRAVEL COMPANY FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* ALLEGIANT TRAVEL CO QTRLY TOTAL OPERATING REVENUE $425.4 MILLION VERSUS $380.0 MILLION
* ALLEGIANT TRAVEL CO - QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.42
* ALLEGIANT TRAVEL CO - SECOND QUARTER SCHEDULED AND SYSTEM ASMS ARE EXPECTED TO GROW BETWEEN TEN AND FOURTEEN PERCENT VERSUS LAST YEAR
* ALLEGIANT TRAVEL CO - SEES 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE BETWEEN $10-$12
* ALLEGIANT TRAVEL CO - SEES 2018 CAPEX EXCLUDING SUNSEEKER RESORTS OF $300 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
